content: bosque mediterraneo includes video tutorials that make sure you do not stop at any time in your knitting it is specially designed to be the official pattern for **barcelona knits 2025** many thanks to the organisers for allowing me to be part of this very special occasion **size** one size it has a triangular asimetric shape with final measurements 202 x 154 x 121cm **yarn** 3 skeins of fingering weight 380m/100g in 2 colours 1 skein of one colour and 2 of another colour which contrast nicely the sample shown used 3 skeins of lalanalú nadir 100% spanish merino wool made sustainably 380m/100g one in the colour light green and two in dark green these amounts are approximate the total amount of yarn used will also depend on the type of yarn your gauge or any modifications you may make to the item **needles** 4mm circular needles with a cable of 80 cm or size needed to get gauge **gauge** in garter stitch knit all row 22 stitches x 22 row gives 10 x 10 cm before blocking 20 stitches x 18 row gives 10 x 10 cm after blocking it is a good idea to note down the measurements of your swatch before and after blocking to allow you to estimate the final measurements when you make your gauge swatch it is very important that you block it and check that the colours you are working with don t bleed or transfer **other materiales** two stitch markers to mark the centre of the piece and various others if needed to mark the lace repeats to make them easier to follow optional various locking stitch markers to help count the row optional blocking tools mats t-pins cables etc tape measure tapestry needles and scissors **construction notes** bosque mediterráneo is a shawl with three clearly differentiated sections with an arrowhead silhouette and structural change in the first and second sections we shape the shawl by increasing and decreasing at the beginning and end of each row and working a double decrease on every right side row in section 3 we do the same but we create an asymmetrical shape by increasing at only one edge and decreasing at the other in this way we manage to give that perfect visual interest to choose5-and finally the neckline and sleeves are finished in 1x1 rib ready time to find a summery outfit to go with your tee and enjoy it **difficulty level** 3 out of 5 ----------------------- español bosque mediterraneo incluye videotutoriales que hacen
